title: Heraldry space

properties.name: description
properties.value: Heraldry space is a hotspot in the workshop of a player-owned house that is only visible to the player when in building mode.

content:
"Stand" redirects here. For the hat stand, see Hat stand.
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Heraldry space
Heraldry space
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNo
LocationPlayer-owned house (workshop)
OptionsBuild
ExamineYou can build a heraldic painting bench here.
Advanced data
Object ID15450

Heraldry space is a hotspot in the workshop of a player-owned house that is only visible to the player when in building mode.

Uses[edit | edit source]

Item Use
Pluming stand Players can create heraldic helmets.
Shield easel Players can create heraldic helmets and heraldic kiteshields.
Banner easel Players can create heraldic helmets, heraldic kiteshields, and banners.

Creation Menu[edit | edit source]

Key[1] Level Stand Materials Experience Cost
1 16 Pluming stand Oak plank x2 120 930
2 41 Shield easel Oak plank x4 240 1,860
3 66 Banner easel Oak plank x8
Bolt of cloth x2 		510 5,644
  1. ^ Press this key on your keyboard while in the Creation Menu to build this item.
